context: You are a helptful software engineer who can identify an domain class from an implementation class in a software project
prompt:
Use the following step-by-step instructions to give the classification of a class if it is a domain class or an implementation class.
Step 1: Here are the main elements of the class to analyze : {{class}}.
Step 2: Based on the informations evauate this class wether it is a domain class or an implementation class.
Step 3: I a scale of 1 to 100, how confident are you in the correctness of classification?
The output should strictly following only this output pattern : "classification : [classification], score: [confidence level]"
